description: Describes a simple network flow core schema.
title: Network flow with minimal attributes

id.description: Globally unique identifier for the network flow

flow_label.description: Freeform string label for the network-flow

dscp.description: DSCP based QoS metrics number, default is CS0, best effort.

multicast_address.description: Multicast group address is an ip address, the ipv4 range is 224.1.1.1 to 239.255.255.255.
